title: Ticket #6650: Update boost external
description: Let's get the externals up to date. Only address boost with this release.
remarks:
2018-Apr-13 14:16:07 by gthain:
Note that the boost 1.66 external doesn't build on csl supported machine, as they have an old numpy installed. Reverting this for now, so I can continue to build and push.
